0.text: Innate - Four Stances: Udyr has no ultimate ability and instead has 4 basic abilities. Each ability grants a Stance: a unique passive effect that lasts until casting a different ability. Switching Stances will prevent his previous Stance from triggering any more on-hit effects, and incur a  1.5-second global cooldown on his other abilities.
0.html: Innate - Four Stances: Udyr has no ultimate ability and instead has 4 basic abilities. Each ability grants a Stance: a unique passive effect that lasts until casting a different ability. Switching Stances will prevent his previous Stance from triggering any more on-hit effects, and incur a  1.5-second global cooldown on his other abilities.
markedPassages: 1.5-second

1.text: Starting at level 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.
1.html: Starting at level 16, all abilities can gain a 6th rank.

2.text: Innate: Udyr's ability casts generate a stack of Monkey's Agility for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 3 times.Monkey's Agility: For each stack, Udyr gains  5 bonus movement speed and  10% bonus attack speed, up to 15 bonus movement speed and 30% bonus attack speed.
2.html:
Innate: Udyr's ability casts generate a stack of Monkey's Agility for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 3 times.

Monkey's Agility: For each stack, Udyr gains  5 bonus movement speed and  10% bonus attack speed, up to 15 bonus movement speed and 30% bonus attack speed.
markedPassages: 5 bonus movement speed
10% bonus attack speed

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Tiger. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to inflict Tiger Strike, and also generates a Tiger stack.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Tiger. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to inflict Tiger Strike, and also generates a Tiger stack.

1.text: Tiger Strike: The target is dealt bonus physical damage every 0.5 seconds over 2 seconds. Leftover damage is dealt instantly upon subsequent infliction.
1.html: Tiger Strike: The target is dealt bonus physical damage every 0.5 seconds over 2 seconds. Leftover damage is dealt instantly upon subsequent infliction.

2.text: Active: Udyr gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Tiger stacks.
2.html: Active: Udyr gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Tiger stacks.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Turtle. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to  heal himself for  2% − 4% (based on missing health) of his maximum health, and also generates a Turtle stack. This effect does not trigger if Udyr is at full health.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Turtle. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to heal himself for  2% − 4% (based on missing health) of his maximum health, and also generates a Turtle stack. This effect does not trigger if Udyr is at full health.
markedPassages: heal
2% − 4% (based on missing health) of his maximum health
2% − 4% (based on missing health) of his maximum health
2% − 4% (based on missing health) of his maximum health
2% − 4% (based on missing health) of his maximum health

1.text: Active: Udyr  shields himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Turtle stacks.
1.html: Active: Udyr shields himself for up to 5 seconds, and instantly generates 3 Turtle stacks.
markedPassages: shields

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks are empowered to have an  uncancellable windup and  stun the target for 1 second. The target is then marked Mauled for 5 seconds, becoming immune to the stun.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks are empowered to have an uncancellable windup and stun the target for 1 second. The target is then marked Mauled for 5 seconds, becoming immune to the stun.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
stun

1.text: Active: Udyr gains  bonus movement speed and  ghosting for the next few seconds. During this time, his basic attacks against enemy  champions are empowered to  lunge 50 units toward them, unless they are marked Mauled.
1.html: Active: Udyr gains  bonus movement speed and ghosting for the next few seconds. During this time, his basic attacks against enemy champions are empowered to lunge 50 units toward them, unless they are marked Mauled.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed
ghosting
champions
lunge

0.text: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Phoenix. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to unleash fire in a cone in front of him that deals magic damage to enemies hit, and also generate a Phoenix stack.
0.html: Stance: Udyr's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Phoenix. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to unleash fire in a cone in front of him that deals magic damage to enemies hit, and also generate a Phoenix stack.

1.text: Active: Udyr creates an aura of pulsing fire for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to nearby enemies. He also instantly generates 3 Phoenix stacks.
1.html: Active: Udyr creates an aura of pulsing fire for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to nearby enemies. He also instantly generates 3 Phoenix stacks.

Active: Udyr gains  bonus movement speed and  ghosting for the next few seconds. During this time, his basic attacks against enemy  champions become empowered to  lunge 50 units toward them, unless they are marked Mauled.
